response.original_title: もぎたてマリナちゃん
response.overview: The notorious thief Marina plans to steal the golden statue of the Virgin Mary from a church together with her comrades, as she finally wants to move on to bigger things during her robberies. But the head nun manages to catch her and her nuns in the act, and as punishment, she has to serve the church as a nun herself. Shortly afterwards, she is visited by her friend Shiori, who has opened a café in the meantime but has since had a tragic car accident and is being blackmailed by a ruthless criminal. To help her, the head nun allows Marina to use her golden fingers once again...
response.title: Sister Marina
